name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Moncton Flight College - CYQM Talon Mods

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps to modify Talon's Ops Graphical view for better readability and added features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple chrome extension for adding a function skin over Talon's Ops Graphical View. This extension is specific to CYQM base. Do not use for CYFC!
